Futurama

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by TVmaze

Last updated:
Tue, 13 Oct 2015 -1:00
aired from: Mar 1999
to: Sep 2013
cancelled/ended		 124 eps Comedy Central (US) / Fox (US) 30 min animated
comedy
sci-fi
  • regulars:
  • Billy West as the voice of Phillip J. Fry / Zapp Brannigan / Prof. Hubert J. Fansworth / Dr. Zoidberg / many others
  • Katey Sagal as the voice of Leela
  • John DiMaggio as the voice of Bender

  • recurring characters:
  • Phil LaMarr as the voice of Hermes Conrad
  • Lauren Tom as the voice of Amy Wong

The amazing adventures of a man from 1999 who is unfrozen in the 31st century.
